meta.title: Foody — Modern POS + QR Self-Ordering for Restaurants
meta.description: Foody POS - Modern cloud-connected Point of Sale with QR self-ordering

header.badge_text: Modern POS + QR Self‑Ordering • Real‑time • Multi‑restaurant
header.title: Increase sales and reduce staff pressure with a POS built for modern restaurants.
header.lead: Foody is a cloud‑connected Point of Sale that combines a fast iPad POS for your team with QR Code self‑ordering for guests. Orders and updates sync in real time — from table to kitchen to payment.

stats.qr_desc: Guests order & pay from the table (waiter-free flow)
stats.realtime_desc: WebSocket updates: created / in kitchen / ready / served / paid
stats.multilang_desc: POS UI + printing ready (including RTL support)

problem.title: Busy shifts, missed upsells, and slow service hurt revenue.
problem.description: Restaurants lose money when teams are overloaded: long waiting times, manual mistakes, guests trying to catch a waiter, and limited ability to sell add-ons.
problem.subtitle: Common pain points:
problem.point1: Staff spending time on repetitive tasks instead of hospitality
problem.point2: Orders lost between floor and kitchen
problem.point3: No live status tracking for guests
problem.point4: Hard to keep menus and prices updated in real time

solution.title: One system for staff + guests, fully synchronized.
solution.description: Foody connects three experiences: an iPad POS for staff, a mobile web app for guests, and a Go backend that orchestrates orders and real-time events.
solution.point2: Guest web app: scan QR → browse menu → order → track status live
solution.point3: Server: multi-tenant RBAC, menu & orders, secure QR validation

features.section_description: Built specifically for restaurants: fast workflows, clear table status, smart printing, and real-time ordering.
features.pos_desc: Table grid, order creation, payments, reprints, and operational flow designed for speed.
features.qr_desc: Guests order from the table. Secure QR validation + customer sessions + live order tracking.
features.printing_desc: ESC/POS printing, multilingual support (including Hebrew), clean layouts for kitchen + customer.
features.realtime_desc: WebSocket events: new online orders, status updates, payment updates — instantly.
features.roles_desc: Owner, manager, cashier, waiter, chef — each with appropriate access (RBAC).
features.analytics_desc: Daily/weekly reporting, top sellers, staff performance (MVP scope).

how_it_works.qr_description: Your team generates a secure QR per table. Guests scan, order, and follow the status timeline.
how_it_works.qr_step4: POS receives event → prints kitchen ticket
how_it_works.qr_step5: Guest tracks: Open → In kitchen → Ready → Served
how_it_works.who_description: Designed for restaurants that want modern service without sacrificing control.
